entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
